elements.name: Auftrag
elements.title: Let's assume that city governments lower rents by law and then fix them. Would such a measure reduce or increase the housing shortage in the trendy big cities?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Justify your answer by referring to the relevant market law.
elements.correctAnswer:
The housing shortage would tend to increase. Market law: prices fall

⇨ Supply of rental apartments falls (because it is unattractive for real estate companies as there is no profit to be made)

⇨ Demand for rental apartments rises (because the low rents make living in these trendy cities even more attractive)
